name: Icey Meowth's Basics PLB BFV Build
name_original: Icey Meowth's Basics PLB BFV Build
description: The Story:So Icey Meowth Has Taken Over Pizza Luigi's School And Built New Rooms So Now You Have To Save Pizza Luigi Before Meowth Kills Him You Play As Erics Friend Camron And Eric Was Also Kidnapped And Brainwashed To Be A Principal So You Have To Save Eric And Pizza Luigi.
